trans-unit.source: Defines the compatibility guarantee of a component, type, or type member that may span multiple versions.
trans-unit.target: 定義元件、 類型或類型成員，可能會跨越多個版本的相容性保證。

trans-unit.source: The ComponentGuaranteesAttribute is used by developers of components and class libraries to indicate the level of compatibility that consumers of their libraries can expect across multiple versions.
trans-unit.target: ComponentGuaranteesAttribute 由元件和類別庫的開發人員用於指出他們的程式庫的取用者可以預期在多個版本的相容性層級。

trans-unit.source: It indicates the level of guarantee that a future version of the library or component will not break an existing client.
trans-unit.target: 它表示在程式庫或元件的未來版本將不會中斷現有用戶端的保證層級。

trans-unit.source: Clients can then use the ComponentGuaranteesAttribute as an aid in designing their own interfaces to ensure stability across versions.
trans-unit.target: 用戶端接著可以使用 ComponentGuaranteesAttribute 設計自己的介面，以確保穩定性不同版本之間協助。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The common language runtime (CLR) does not use this attribute in any way.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Common language runtime (CLR) 不會以任何方式使用這個屬性。

trans-unit.source: Its value lies in formally documenting the intent of the component author.
trans-unit.target: 正式記載元件作者的意圖在於它的值。

trans-unit.source: Compile-time tools can also use these declarations to detect compile-time errors that would otherwise break the declared guarantee.
trans-unit.target: 編譯時期工具也可以使用這些宣告來偵測的編譯時期錯誤，否則會破壞宣告的保證。

trans-unit.source: Levels of Compatibility The ComponentGuaranteesAttribute supports the following levels of compatibility, which are represented by members of the <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ComponentGuaranteesOptions> enumeration: - No version-to-version compatibility (<xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ComponentGuaranteesOptions?displayProperty=fullName>).
trans-unit.target: 層級的相容性 ComponentGuaranteesAttribute 支援下列層級的相容性，其中的成員都由<xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ComponentGuaranteesOptions>列舉型別:-任何版本的版本相容性 (<xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ComponentGuaranteesOptions?displayProperty=fullName>)。</xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ComponentGuaranteesOptions?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ComponentGuaranteesOptions>

trans-unit.source: The client can expect that future versions will break the existing client.
trans-unit.target: 用戶端可以預期未來版本將會中斷現有用戶端。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the [No Compatibility](#None) section later in this topic.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[無相容](#None)本主題稍後的章節。

trans-unit.source: - Side-by-side version-to-version compatibility (<xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ComponentGuaranteesOptions?displayProperty=fullName>).
trans-unit.target: ---並存版本的版本相容性 (<xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ComponentGuaranteesOptions?displayProperty=fullName>)。</xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ComponentGuaranteesOptions?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The component has been tested to work when more than one version of the assembly is loaded in the same application domain.
trans-unit.target: 元件已經過測試時相同的應用程式定義域中載入的組件的多個版本運作。

trans-unit.source: In general, future versions can break compatibility.
trans-unit.target: 一般情況下，未來版本可能會破壞相容性。

trans-unit.source: However, when breaking changes are made, the old version is not modified but exists alongside the new version.
trans-unit.target: 不過，重大變更時，舊的版本則不會修改，但與新的版本。

trans-unit.source: Side-by-side execution is the expected way to make existing clients work when breaking changes are made.
trans-unit.target: 並存執行是預期的方式進行重大變更時所使用的現有用戶端。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the [Side-by-Side Compatibility](#SideBySide) section later in this topic.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[-並存相容性](#SideBySide)本主題稍後的章節。

trans-unit.source: - Stable version-to-version compatibility (<xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ComponentGuaranteesOptions?displayProperty=fullName>).
trans-unit.target: -穩定版本的版本相容性 (<xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ComponentGuaranteesOptions?displayProperty=fullName>)。</xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ComponentGuaranteesOptions?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Future versions should not break the client, and side-by-side execution should not be needed.
trans-unit.target: 未來的版本應該不會中斷用戶端，並不需要為並存執行。

trans-unit.source: However, if the client is inadvertently broken, it may be possible to use side-by-side execution to fix the problem.
trans-unit.target: 不過，如果用戶端是不小心中斷的它可能無法使用-並存執行來修正此問題。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the [Stable Compatibility](#Standard) section.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[穩定的相容性](#Standard)> 一節。

trans-unit.source: - Exchange version-to-version compatibility (<xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ComponentGuaranteesOptions?displayProperty=fullName>).
trans-unit.target: -交換版本的版本相容性 (<xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ComponentGuaranteesOptions?displayProperty=fullName>)。</xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ComponentGuaranteesOptions?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Extraordinary care is taken to ensure that future versions will not break the client.
trans-unit.target: 特別是小心確保未來版本將不會中斷用戶端。

trans-unit.source: The client should use only these types in the signature of interfaces that are used for communication with other assemblies that are deployed independently of one another.
trans-unit.target: 用戶端應該使用僅限這些類型的簽章可用來與其他組件部署彼此通訊的介面中。

trans-unit.source: Only one version of these types is expected to be in a given application domain, which means that if a client breaks, side-by-side execution cannot fix the compatibility problem.
trans-unit.target: 只有一個版本的這些型別必須是在指定的應用程式網域中，這表示如果用戶端中斷時，由並行執行無法修正相容性問題。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the [Exchange Type Compatibility](#Exchange) section.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[Exchange 類型相容性](#Exchange)> 一節。

trans-unit.source: The following sections discuss each level of guarantee in greater detail.
trans-unit.target: 下列章節會討論每個層級的更詳細的保證。

trans-unit.source: ### No Compatibility Marking a component as indicates that the provider makes no guarantees about compatibility.
trans-unit.target: # # # 不標示為元件的相容性指出提供者，並不保證相容性。

trans-unit.source: Clients should avoid taking any dependencies on the exposed interfaces.
trans-unit.target: 用戶端應避免採用任何相依項目上公開的介面。

trans-unit.source: This level of compatibility is useful for types that are experimental or that are publicly exposed but are intended only for components that are always updated at the same time.
trans-unit.target: 此相容性層級可用於實驗或，都公開屬性，但僅供一定會同時更新的元件類型。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ComponentGuaranteesOptions> explicitly indicates that this component should not be used by external components.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ComponentGuaranteesOptions>明確表示不應該由外部元件使用此元件。</xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ComponentGuaranteesOptions>

trans-unit.source: ### Side-by-Side Compatibility Marking a component as indicates that the component has been tested to work when more than one version of the assembly is loaded into the same application domain.
trans-unit.target: # # #-並存相容性標示為元件指出元件已經過測試以使用多個版本的組件載入至相同的應用程式定義域時。

trans-unit.source: Breaking changes are allowed as long as they are made to the assembly that has the greater version number.
trans-unit.target: 重大變更允許的長度不會對具有更高的版本號碼之組件。

trans-unit.source: Components that are bound to an old version of the assembly are expected to continue to bind to the old version, and other components can bind to the new version.
trans-unit.target: 繫結至較舊版本的組件的元件應繼續繫結至舊的版本，而其他元件可以繫結至新的版本中。

trans-unit.source: It is also possible to update a component that is declared to be <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ComponentGuaranteesOptions> by destructively modifying the old version.
trans-unit.target: 您也可更新的元件，會宣告為<xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ComponentGuaranteesOptions>破壞性的方式修改舊的版本。</xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ComponentGuaranteesOptions>

trans-unit.source: ### Stable Compatibility Marking a type as indicates that the type should remain stable across versions.
trans-unit.target: # # # 穩定標記做為類型的相容性指出不同版本之間應該維持穩定的型別。

trans-unit.source: However, it may also be possible for side-by-side versions of a stable type to exist in the same application domain.
trans-unit.target: 不過，它也可能由並行版本的穩定的型別存在於相同的應用程式定義域。

trans-unit.source: Stable types maintain a high binary compatibility bar.
trans-unit.target: 穩定的型別會維護高二進位碼相容性列。

trans-unit.source: Because of this, providers should avoid making breaking changes to stable types.
trans-unit.target: 因為這個緣故，提供者應該避免對穩定的型別進行重大變更。

trans-unit.source: The following kinds of changes are acceptable: - Adding private instance fields to, or removing fields from, a type, as long as this does not break the serialization format.
trans-unit.target: 下列種類的變更是否可接受:-私用執行個體欄位中加入或移除欄位，型別，因為這不會中斷的序列化格式。

trans-unit.source: - Changing a non-serializable type to a serializable type.
trans-unit.target: -非可序列化的類型變更為可序列化的型別。

trans-unit.source: (However, a serializable type cannot be changed to a non-serializable type.) - Throwing new, more derived exceptions from a method.
trans-unit.target: （不過，可序列化的型別不能變更為非可序列化的型別）。 擲回新的衍生程度較大方法中的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: - Improving the performance of a method.
trans-unit.target: 為提升效能的方法。

trans-unit.source: - Changing the range of return values, as long as the change does not adversely affect the majority of clients.
trans-unit.target: 變更傳回值的範圍，只要變更不會造成不良影響大部分的用戶端。

trans-unit.source: - Fixing serious bugs, if the business justification is high and the number of adversely affected clients is low.
trans-unit.target: 修正嚴重錯誤，如果業務理由很高，而且造成負面影響的用戶端數目不足。

trans-unit.source: Because new versions of stable components are not expected to break existing clients, generally only one version of a stable component is needed in an application domain.
trans-unit.target: 因為新版本的穩定的元件不會中斷現有用戶端，通常只有一個版本的穩定元件需要應用程式定義域中。

trans-unit.source: However, this is not a requirement, because stable types are not used as well-known exchange types that all components agree upon.
trans-unit.target: 不過，這不是必要條件，因為穩定的類型不會使用所有元件都同意的已知的交換類型。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, if a new version of a stable component does inadvertently break some component, and if other components need the new version, it may be possible to fix the problem by loading both the old and new component.
trans-unit.target: 因此，如果穩定元件的新版本沒有不小心中斷某個元件，而且需要新版本的其他元件，它可能無法載入同時舊的和新元件，以解決此問題。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ComponentGuaranteesOptions> provides a stronger version compatibility guarantee than <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ComponentGuaranteesOptions>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ComponentGuaranteesOptions>提供更強的版本相容性保證<xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ComponentGuaranteesOptions>.</xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ComponentGuaranteesOptions>比</xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ComponentGuaranteesOptions>

trans-unit.source: It is a common default for multi-version components.
trans-unit.target: 它是多個版本元件的一般預設值。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ComponentGuaranteesOptions> can be combined with <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ComponentGuaranteesOptions>, which states that the component will not break compatibility but is tested to work when more than one version is loaded in a given application domain.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ComponentGuaranteesOptions>可以結合<xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ComponentGuaranteesOptions>，其狀態不會中斷相容性元件，但是會測試工作時指定的應用程式定義域中載入多個版本。</xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ComponentGuaranteesOptions></xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ComponentGuaranteesOptions>

trans-unit.source: After a type or method is marked as <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ComponentGuaranteesOptions>, it can be upgraded to <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ComponentGuaranteesOptions>.
trans-unit.target: 類型或方法標記為<xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ComponentGuaranteesOptions>時，它可以升級至<xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ComponentGuaranteesOptions>。</xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ComponentGuaranteesOptions></xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ComponentGuaranteesOptions>之後

trans-unit.source: However, it cannot be downgraded to <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ComponentGuaranteesOptions>.
trans-unit.target: 不過，無法降級至<xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ComponentGuaranteesOptions>。</xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ComponentGuaranteesOptions>

trans-unit.source: ### Exchange Type Compatibility Marking a type as provides a stronger version compatibility guarantee than , and should be applied to the most stable of all types.
trans-unit.target: # # # 交換類型的類型做為標記的相容性提供更強的版本相容性保證比，而且應該套用到所有類型的最穩定。

trans-unit.source: These types are intended to be used for interchange between independently built components across all component boundaries in both time (any version of the CLR or any version of a component or application) and space (cross-process, cross-CLR in one process, cross-application domain in one CLR).
trans-unit.target: 這些類型被要用於跨同時時間 （任何版本的 CLR） 或任何版本的元件或應用程式中的所有元件界限獨立建置的元件和空間 (跨處理序跨-CLR 在某一個處理序一個 CLR 中跨應用程式網域中) 之間的交換。

trans-unit.source: If a breaking change is made to an exchange type, it is impossible to fix the issue by loading multiple versions of the type.
trans-unit.target: 如果一項重大變更對交換類型，就無法載入類型的多個版本來修正問題。

trans-unit.source: Exchange types should be changed only when a problem is very serious (such as a severe security issue) or the probability of breakage is very low (that is, if the behavior was already broken in a random way that code could not have conceivably taken a dependency on).
trans-unit.target: 問題非常嚴重 （如嚴重的安全性問題） 或遭破壞的可能性極低 （亦即，如果已經是行為已損毀的程式碼可能不理論上花費相依性上以隨機方式） 時，才應該變更交換類型。

trans-unit.source: You can make the following kinds of changes to an exchange type: - Add inheritance of new interface definitions.
trans-unit.target: 您可以對交換類型中的下列幾種變更:-加入新的介面定義的繼承。

trans-unit.source: - Add new private methods that implement the methods of newly inherited interface definitions.
trans-unit.target: 新增新的私用方法實作新繼承的介面定義的方法。

trans-unit.source: - Add new static fields.
trans-unit.target: 新增新的靜態欄位。

trans-unit.source: - Add new static methods.
trans-unit.target: 新增新的靜態方法。

trans-unit.source: - Add new non-virtual instance methods.
trans-unit.target: 新增新的非虛擬執行個體方法。

trans-unit.source: The following are considered breaking changes and are not allowed for primitive types: - Changing serialization formats.
trans-unit.target: 下列會被視為重大變更，而且不允許的基本型別:-變更序列化格式。

trans-unit.source: Version-tolerant serialization is required.
trans-unit.target: 需要版本相容序列化。

trans-unit.source: - Adding or removing private instance fields.
trans-unit.target: -新增或移除私用執行個體欄位。

trans-unit.source: This risks changing the serialization format of the type and breaking client code that uses reflection.
trans-unit.target: 這個風險變更類型的序列化格式，並中斷用戶端程式碼使用反映。

trans-unit.source: - Changing the serializability of a type.
trans-unit.target: 變更類型的可序列化能力。

trans-unit.source: A non-serializable type may not be made serializable, and vice versa.
trans-unit.target: 非可序列化的型別不能成為可序列化，反之亦然。

trans-unit.source: - Throwing different exceptions from a method.
trans-unit.target: 擲回不同的例外狀況，從方法。

trans-unit.source: - Changing the range of a method's return values, unless the member definition raises this possibility and clearly indicates how clients should handle unknown values.
trans-unit.target: 變更的範圍，該方法的傳回值，除非成員定義引發這種可能性，並清楚指出用戶端應該如何處理未知的值。

trans-unit.source: - Fixing most bugs.
trans-unit.target: 修正大部分的錯誤。

trans-unit.source: Consumers of the type will rely on the existing behavior.
trans-unit.target: 類型的取用者將會依賴現有的行為。

trans-unit.source: After a component, type, or member is marked with the <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ComponentGuaranteesOptions> guarantee, it cannot be changed to either <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ComponentGuaranteesOptions> or <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ComponentGuaranteesOptions>.
trans-unit.target: 一個元件之後, 類型或成員會標示的<xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ComponentGuaranteesOptions>保證，它不能變更為其中一個<xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ComponentGuaranteesOptions>或<xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ComponentGuaranteesOptions>.</xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ComponentGuaranteesOptions> </xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ComponentGuaranteesOptions> </xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ComponentGuaranteesOptions>

trans-unit.source: Typically, exchange types are the basic types (such as <xref:System.Int32> and <xref:System.String> in the .NET Framework) and interfaces (such as <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IList%601>, <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601>, and <xref:System.IComparable%601>) that are commonly used in public interfaces.
trans-unit.target: 一般而言，交換類型是基本類型 (例如<xref:System.Int32>和<xref:System.String>.NET Framework 中) 和介面 (例如<xref:System.Collections.Generic.IList%601>， <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601>，和<xref:System.IComparable%601>)，常用於公用介面。</xref:System.IComparable%601> </xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601> </xref:System.Collections.Generic.IList%601> </xref:System.String> </xref:System.Int32>

trans-unit.source: Exchange types may publicly expose only other types that are also marked with <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ComponentGuaranteesOptions> compatibility.
trans-unit.target: 交換類型可能會公開也標記著其他型別<xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ComponentGuaranteesOptions>相容性。</xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ComponentGuaranteesOptions>

trans-unit.source: In addition, exchange types cannot depend on the behavior of Windows APIs that are prone to change.
trans-unit.target: 此外，exchange 類型不能相依於容易發生變更的 Windows Api 的行為。

trans-unit.source: Component Guarantees: A Summary The following table indicates how a component's characteristics and usage affect its compatibility guarantee.
trans-unit.target: 元件保證︰ 下表摘要表示元件的特性和使用方式如何影響其相容性保證。

trans-unit.source: |Component characteristics|Exchange|Stable|Side-by-Side|None| |-------------------------------|--------------|------------|--------------------|----------| |Can be used in interfaces between components that version independently.|Y|N|N|N| |Can be used (privately) by an assembly that versions independently.|Y|Y|Y|N| |Can have multiple versions in a single application domain.|N|Y|Y|Y| |Can make breaking changes|N|N|Y|Y| |Tested to make certain multiple versions of the assembly can be loaded together.|N|N|Y|N| |Can make breaking changes in place.|N|N|N|Y| |Can make very safe non-breaking servicing changes in place.|Y|Y|Y|Y| ## Applying the Attribute You can apply the ComponentGuaranteesAttribute to an assembly, a type, or a type member.
trans-unit.target: |元件特性 |Exchange |穩定 |並存 |None | |-------------------------------|--------------|------------|--------------------|----------| |可以是在元件之間的介面中該版本單獨使用。 |Y |N |N |N | |可以是 （公開） 的組件的版本單獨使用。 |Y |Y |Y |N | |可以在單一應用程式網域中有多個版本。 |N |Y |Y |Y | |可以進行重大變更 |N |N |Y |Y | |測試要進行特定多個版本的組件可以載入在一起。 |N |N |Y |N | |可以在位置進行重大變更。 |N |N |N |Y | |可以進行非常安全非中斷服務的位置中的變更。 |Y |Y |Y |Y | # # 套用屬性您可以將 ComponentGuaranteesAttribute 套用至組件、 類型或類型成員。

trans-unit.source: Its application is hierarchical.
trans-unit.target: 它的應用程式是階層式。

trans-unit.source: That is, by default, the guarantee defined by the <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ComponentGuaranteesAttribute.Guarantees%2A> property of the attribute at the assembly level defines the guarantee of all types in the assembly and all members in those types.
trans-unit.target: 也就是說，根據預設，保證所定義<xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ComponentGuaranteesAttribute.Guarantees%2A>組件層級屬性的屬性定義的所有類型的保證組件，這些型別中的所有成員。</xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ComponentGuaranteesAttribute.Guarantees%2A>

trans-unit.source: Similarly, if the guarantee is applied to the type, by default it also applies to each member of the type.
trans-unit.target: 同樣地，如果保證套用至型別，依預設它也適用於每個型別的成員。

trans-unit.source: This inherited guarantee can be overridden by applying the ComponentGuaranteesAttribute to individual types and type members.
trans-unit.target: 此繼承的保證可覆寫將 ComponentGuaranteesAttribute 套用至個別的類型和類型成員。

trans-unit.source: However, guarantees that override the default can only weaken the guarantee; they cannot strengthen it.
trans-unit.target: 不過，覆寫預設的保證只會減弱保證;它們無法進行加強。

trans-unit.source: For example, if an assembly is marked with the <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ComponentGuaranteesOptions> guarantee, its types and members have no compatibility guarantee, and any other guarantee that is applied to types or members in the assembly is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果組件標記為<xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ComponentGuaranteesOptions>保證，其型別和成員有不相容性保證，且會套用至型別或成員的組件中的任何其他保證會被忽略。</xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ComponentGuaranteesOptions>

trans-unit.source: Testing the Guarantee The <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ComponentGuaranteesAttribute.Guarantees%2A> property returns a member of the <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ComponentGuaranteesOptions> enumeration, which is marked with the <xref:System.FlagsAttribute> attribute.
trans-unit.target: 測試就可以保證<xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ComponentGuaranteesAttribute.Guarantees%2A>屬性傳回的成員<xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ComponentGuaranteesOptions>列舉型別，會以標示<xref:System.FlagsAttribute>屬性。</xref:System.FlagsAttribute> </xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ComponentGuaranteesOptions> </xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ComponentGuaranteesAttribute.Guarantees%2A>

trans-unit.source: This means that you should test for the flag that you are interested in by masking away potentially unknown flags.
trans-unit.target: 這表示您應該針對您所感興趣遮罩離開可能無法辨識的旗標的旗標測試。

trans-unit.source: For example, the following example tests whether a type is marked as <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ComponentGuaranteesOptions>.
trans-unit.target: 例如，下列範例會測試是否為型別會標示為<xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ComponentGuaranteesOptions>.</xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ComponentGuaranteesOptions>

trans-unit.source: [!code-cs[System.Runtime.Versioning.ComponentGuaranteesAttribute.Class#1](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.runtime.version_1.cs)] [!code-vb[System.Runtime.Versioning.ComponentGuaranteesAttribute.Class#1](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.runtime.version_1.vb)] The following example tests whether a type is marked as <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ComponentGuaranteesOptions> or <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ComponentGuaranteesOptions>.
trans-unit.target: [!code-cs[System.Runtime.Versioning.ComponentGuaranteesAttribute.Class#1](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.runtime.version_1.cs)][!code-vb[System.Runtime.Versioning.ComponentGuaranteesAttribute.Class#1](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.runtime.version_1.vb) ]下列範例會測試是否為型別標示為<xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ComponentGuaranteesOptions>或<xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ComponentGuaranteesOptions>.</xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ComponentGuaranteesOptions> </xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ComponentGuaranteesOptions>

trans-unit.source: [!code-cs[System.Runtime.Versioning.ComponentGuaranteesAttribute.Class#2](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.runtime.version_2.cs)] [!code-vb[System.Runtime.Versioning.ComponentGuaranteesAttribute.Class#2](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.runtime.version_2.vb)] The following example tests wither a type is marked as <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ComponentGuaranteesOptions> (that is, neither <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ComponentGuaranteesOptions> nor <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ComponentGuaranteesOptions>).
trans-unit.target: [!code-cs[System.Runtime.Versioning.ComponentGuaranteesAttribute.Class#2](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.runtime.version_2.cs)][!code-vb[System.Runtime.Versioning.ComponentGuaranteesAttribute.Class#2](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.runtime.version_2.vb) ]下列範例測試排除的型別標示為<xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ComponentGuaranteesOptions>(也就是說，兩者皆非<xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ComponentGuaranteesOptions>也<xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ComponentGuaranteesOptions>)。</xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ComponentGuaranteesOptions> </xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ComponentGuaranteesOptions> </xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ComponentGuaranteesOptions>

trans-unit.source: [!code-cs[System.Runtime.Versioning.ComponentGuaranteesAttribute.Class#3](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.runtime.version_3.cs)] [!code-vb[System.Runtime.Versioning.ComponentGuaranteesAttribute.Class#3](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.runtime.version_3.vb)]
trans-unit.target: [!code-cs[System.Runtime.Versioning.ComponentGuaranteesAttribute.Class#3](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.runtime.version_3.cs)][!code-vb[System.Runtime.Versioning.ComponentGuaranteesAttribute.Class#3 ](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.runtime.version_3.vb)]

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Runtime.Versioning.ComponentGuaranteesAttribute"></xref> class with a value that indicates a library, type, or member's guaranteed level of compatibility across multiple versions.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Runtime.Versioning.ComponentGuaranteesAttribute"></xref>類別值，指出程式庫、 類型或成員的保證跨多個版本的相容性層級。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ComponentGuaranteesAttribute> class is instantiated, the value of the `guarantees` parameter is assigned to the <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ComponentGuaranteesAttribute.Guarantees%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ComponentGuaranteesAttribute>類別具現化，值`guarantees`參數指派給<xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ComponentGuaranteesAttribute.Guarantees%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ComponentGuaranteesAttribute.Guarantees%2A> </xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ComponentGuaranteesAttribute>

trans-unit.source: One of the enumeration values that specifies the level of compatibility that is guaranteed across multiple versions.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個列舉值，指定保證跨多個版本的相容性層級。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates the guaranteed level of compatibility of a library, type, or type member that spans multiple versions.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出程式庫、 類型或類型成員跨越多個版本的相容性的保證層級。

trans-unit.source: The value of the Guarantees property corresponds to the `guarantees` parameter of the <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ComponentGuaranteesAttribute.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 保證屬性的值會對應到`guarantees`參數<xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ComponentGuaranteesAttribute.%23ctor%2A>建構函式。</xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ComponentGuaranteesAttribute.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: One of the enumeration values that specifies the level of compatibility that is guaranteed across multiple versions.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個列舉值，指定保證跨多個版本的相容性層級。
